Name: Victoriana - Steampunk Text Adventure
About the game: The year is 1888. Dr. Cyril Splutterworth – an eccentric inventor- needs brave adventurers to help him explore the Victorian world. Will you busy yourself in the laboratory testing strange gadgets, or hop on a steamship to the frontiers of Her Majesty’s Empire? Victoriana - Steampunk Text Adventure is a text-based game, echoing the style of classic CYOA stories. The text adventure has several possible outcomes. You may have to depend on your charm and charisma, technical knowhow or pure common sense to win the day. A plethora of possibilities await you, and you might even get through it alive!
